author: remm
msg: - As suggested by Peter, replace the (synced) Stack with a specialized unsynced stack.

author: cdupoirieux
msg: (FOR-388 - Add the ability to define a list of plugins src locations to local-deploy them)
to let a project define other source plugins locations.
- Update the fetch-unversioned-plugin target in order to look for the plugin in the different locations
specified in the new property and local-deploy it if found. Else, try to get it from downloading site.
- Suppress the forrest.plugins.src and forrest.plugins.whiteboard.src variables declaration
- Change the fetch-plugin target in order to use the new property in parameter of pluginlist2fetch.xsl.
